message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. This gives you more than a third to settle things quickly.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the shrinking pot. Let's settle this fairly.
The pot is shrinking, Bob, but so is your advantage. I'm offering you 400,000 - take it before it shrinks further!
It seems we're both feeling the pinch, Alice. I'm adjusting my offer slightly for a 52/48 split.  Time is running out for a fair deal.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere fast.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that. 570,000 is my final offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. The deal is getting worse for both of us. I propose an even 50/50 split. This is the most rational choice at this point.
